posts.title: Building a $0/Month Orbital Governance API: From $479 to Free Tier
posts.excerpt: Interactive showcase of a live orbital governance API that manages satellite reservations and tract assignments. See how AWS optimization reduced costs from $479/month to $0 while handling real orbital data.

posts.title: For the Record: Why Accountability Still Matters
posts.excerpt: A reflection on resilience, ethics, and the pursuit of accountability in technology and governance — documenting a professional journey toward transparent systems for Earth and space.

posts.title: Why Orbital Governance Matters
posts.excerpt: Orbital space is becoming the next shared environment of humanity—yet it remains largely unstructured. How do we give structure to a realm that has none?

posts.title: The Orbital Tract Framework: A New Map for Space
posts.excerpt: Introducing a spatial zoning system that organizes near-Earth space into discrete, mappable volumes for better satellite mission planning and space traffic management.

posts.title: Building the Orbital Governance API
posts.excerpt: Technical walkthrough of designing scalable APIs for orbital data transparency, featuring endpoint architecture and segmentation logic for space governance.
